newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Beazer Homes reduced.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Beazer Homes reduced.

text.p: -- Dillon Read & Co analysts John Stanley and Todd Mitchell on Tuesday reduced their rating for Beazer Homes USA Inc to outperform from buy.
-- "The company has stumbled a bit of late and now lacks what we consider a key ingredient in a buy rating in this sector, visibly strong near-term earning momentum," they wrote in a report.
-- They cut their estimate for 1997 earnings per share to $1.80 from $2.20 and to $2.50 from $2.70 for 1998.
-- Shares in the Atlanta home building company closed on Monday at 14-3/4.
